page.description: Given an old style 'handle', set the table pointer.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.HANDLE_SET() method sets the handle number for a table.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim tbl2 as P tbl = table.open("invoice menu") ? tbl.handle() = 4.000000 tbl2 = tbl.handle_set(8) ? tbl2.handle() = 8.000000
